meanings.definition: A legendary figure in Korean mythology, said to be the founder of the first Korean kingdom.
meanings.sent1: In the story, Tangun was a great leader who established the first Korean kingdom.
meanings.sent2: Many people believe that Tangun played a crucial role in the history of Korea.
meanings.sent3: The children enjoyed hearing the tale of Tangun and his kingdom during storytime.
meanings.sent4: Just like Tangun laid the foundation for the kingdom, we must build a strong base for our project.
meanings.sent5: The legend of Tangun has been passed down through generations, inspiring many.

meanings.definition: A type of traditional Korean dance.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, the dancers performed a beautiful Tangun dance.
meanings.sent2: Learning the Tangun dance requires grace and precision.
meanings.sent3: The Tangun dance was so lively that even the shyest person wanted to join.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as fluid as a Tangun dance, captivating everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic beats of the Tangun dance echoed through the hall, filling it with energy.

meanings.definition: A type of Korean martial art.
meanings.sent1: He practiced Tangun diligently to improve his martial arts skills.
meanings.sent2: The Tangun techniques focus on both offense and defense.
meanings.sent3: During the competition, his opponent was surprised by his swift Tangun moves.
meanings.sent4: She felt empowered after mastering the Tangun martial art.
meanings.sent5: The discipline required for Tangun training helped him in other aspects of life too.
